headline.main: Austrian Chancellor Calls for EU-Wide Ban on Turkish Campaigning
headline.print_headline: Austrian Chancellor Calls for EU-Wide Ban on Turkish Campaigning

lead_paragraph: Austrian Chancellor Christian Kern on Sunday called for a European Union-wide ban on campaign appearances by Turkish politicians to avoid having individual member countries like Germany come under pressure from Ankara.
snippet: Austrian Chancellor Christian Kern on Sunday called for a European Union-wide ban on campaign appearances by Turkish politicians to avoid having individual member countries like Germany come under pressure from Ankara....
